title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: Justices
body: U.S. Supreme Court Justices        U.S. Supreme Court Justices of the 1953 session Harris and Ewing/Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division   Â    Front row, left to right: Felix Frankfurter (1939-1962) Hugo Black (1937-1971) Chief Justice Earl Warren (1953-1969) Stanley F. Reed (1938-1957) William O. Douglas (1939-1975) Back row, left to right:  Tom C. Clark (1949-1967) Robert H. Jackson (1941-1954) Harold H. Burton (1945-1958) Sherman Minton (1949-1956)
